text: Reminder: HubSpot has an <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/seo/view-seo-recommendations-in-HubSpot|SEO recommendations tool> built into HubSpot that helps you track down issues and suggests changes you can make.
I am having issues with AHREFs claiming the assets hard coded in our website are missing ALT text, is there a way to edit this in Design Manager?

Hey <@U07DN8ZAD5M>,
yes, you should be able to edit those alt-texts via Design-Manager. To do so, you have to look for every reference in every file and apply the changes.

Tip:
If you're using something like
`<img src="{{ brand_settings.logos[0].src }}">`

You can just add `alt="{{ brand_settings.logos[0].alt }}"` to the img tag
